verses.verse: Doesn't <S%H2451><s%> wisdom cry <S%H7121><s%> out? <S%H5414><s%> Doesn't <S%H2451><s%> understanding raise her voice? <S%H6963><s%>
On the top <S%H7218><s%> of high places <S%H4791><s%> by the way, <S%H1870><s%> where the paths <S%H5410><s%> meet, <S%H1004><s%> she stands. <S%H5324><s%>
Beside the gates, <S%H8179><s%> at <S%H3027><s%> the entry <S%H6310><s%> of the city, <S%H7176><s%> at the entry <S%H6310><s%> doors, <S%H6607><s%> she cries aloud: <S%H7442><s%>
"To you men, <S%H376><s%> I call! <S%H7121><s%> I send my voice <S%H6963><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of mankind. <S%H120><s%>
You simple, <S%H6612><s%> understand <S%H995><s%> prudence. <S%H6195><s%> You fools, <S%H3684><s%> be of an understanding <S%H6195><s%> heart. <S%H3820><s%>
Hear, <S%H8085><s%> for I will speak <S%H1696><s%> excellent things. <S%H5057><s%> The opening <S%H4669><s%> of my lips <S%H8193><s%> is for right things. <S%H4339><s%>
For my mouth <S%H2441><s%> speaks <S%H1897><s%> truth. <S%H571><s%> Wickedness <S%H7562><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to my lips. <S%H8193><s%>
All the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth <S%H6310><s%> are in righteousness. <S%H6664><s%> There is nothing crooked <S%H6617><s%> or perverse in them. <S%H6617><s%>
They are all plain <S%H5228><s%> to him who understands, <S%H995><s%> right <S%H3477><s%> to those who find <S%H4672><s%> knowledge. <S%H1847><s%>
Receive <S%H3947><s%> my instruction <S%H4148><s%> rather than silver; <S%H3701><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%> rather than choice <S%H977><s%> gold. <S%H2742><s%>
For wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than rubies. <S%H6443><s%> All the things that may be desired <S%H2656><s%> can't <S%H7737><s%> be compared to it.
"I, <S%H2451><s%> wisdom, have made prudence <S%H6195><s%> my dwelling. <S%H7931><s%> Find out <S%H4672><s%> knowledge and discretion. <S%H1847><s%>

The fear <S%H3374><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is to hate <S%H8130><s%> evil. <S%H7451><s%> I hate <S%H8130><s%> pride, <S%H1344><s%> arrogance, <S%H1344><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> way, <S%H1870><s%> and the perverse <S%H8419><s%> mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
Counsel <S%H6098><s%> and sound knowledge <S%H8454><s%> are mine. <S%H8454><s%> I have understanding and power. <S%H1369><s%>
By me kings <S%H4428><s%> reign, <S%H4427><s%> and princes <S%H7336><s%> decree <S%H2710><s%> justice. <S%H6664><s%>
By me princes <S%H8269><s%> rule; <S%H8323><s%> nobles, <S%H5081><s%> and all the righteous rulers <S%H8199><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
I love <S%H157><s%> those who love <S%H157><s%> me. <S%H7836><s%> Those who seek me diligently will find me. <S%H4672><s%>
With me are riches, <S%H6239><s%> honor, <S%H3519><s%> enduring <S%H6276><s%> wealth, <S%H1952><s%> and prosperity. <S%H6666><s%>
My fruit <S%H6529><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than gold, <S%H2742><s%> yes, <S%H6337><s%> than fine gold; my yield <S%H8393><s%> than choice <S%H977><s%> silver. <S%H3701><s%>
I walk <S%H1980><s%> in the way <S%H734><s%> of righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the paths <S%H5410><s%> of justice; <S%H4941><s%>
That I may give <S%H5157><s%> wealth <S%H3426><s%> to those who love <S%H157><s%> me. <S%H4390><s%> I fill their treasuries. <S%H214><s%>
"Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> possessed <S%H7069><s%> me in the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of his work, <S%H4659><s%> before <S%H6924><s%> his deeds of old. <S%H4659><s%>
I was set up <S%H5258><s%> from everlasting, <S%H5769><s%> from the beginning, <S%H7218><s%> before <S%H6924><s%> the earth existed. <S%H776><s%>
When there were no depths, <S%H8415><s%> I was brought forth, <S%H2342><s%> when there were no springs <S%H4599><s%> abounding <S%H3513><s%> with water. <S%H4325><s%>
Before the mountains <S%H2022><s%> were settled <S%H2883><s%> in place, <S%H6440><s%> before the hills, <S%H1389><s%> I was brought forth; <S%H2342><s%>
while as yet he had not made <S%H6213><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> nor the fields, <S%H2351><s%> nor the beginning <S%H7218><s%> of the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the world. <S%H8398><s%>
When he established <S%H3559><s%> the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> I was there; <S%H2710><s%> when he set a circle <S%H2329><s%> on the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the deep, <S%H8415><s%>
when he established <S%H553><s%> the clouds <S%H7834><s%> above, <S%H4605><s%> when the springs <S%H5869><s%> of the deep <S%H8415><s%> became strong, <S%H5810><s%>

when he gave <S%H7760><s%> to the sea <S%H3220><s%> its boundary, <S%H2706><s%> that the waters <S%H4325><s%> should not violate <S%H5674><s%> his commandment, <S%H6310><s%> when he marked <S%H2710><s%> out the foundations <S%H4144><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%>
then I was the craftsman <S%H525><s%> by his <S%H681><s%> side. <S%H8191><s%> I was a delight day <S%H3117><s%> by day, <S%H6256><s%> always rejoicing <S%H7832><s%> before him, <S%H6440><s%>
Rejoicing <S%H7832><s%> in his whole <S%H8398><s%> world. <S%H776><s%> My delight <S%H8191><s%> was with the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men. <S%H120><s%>
"Now therefore, <S%H1121><s%> my sons, listen <S%H8085><s%> to me, <S%H835><s%> for blessed are those who keep <S%H8104><s%> my ways. <S%H1870><s%>
Hear <S%H8085><s%> instruction, <S%H4148><s%> and be wise. <S%H2449><s%> Don't <S%H6544><s%> refuse it.

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H120><s%> who hears <S%H8085><s%> me, <S%H8245><s%> watching daily <S%H3117><s%> at my gates, <S%H1817><s%> waiting <S%H8104><s%> at my door <S%H6607><s%> posts. <S%H4201><s%>
For whoever finds <S%H4672><s%> me, <S%H4672><s%> finds life, <S%H2416><s%> and will obtain <S%H6329><s%> favor <S%H7522><s%> from Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
But he who sins <S%H2398><s%> against me wrongs <S%H2554><s%> his own soul. <S%H5315><s%> All those who hate <S%H8130><s%> me love <S%H157><s%> death. <S%H4194><s%>"
